channel.title: Blue screen
channel.description: [So this is a bit weird but the part were you first go on a tram and you can ride it all the way to the radiation pit, when ever i get close to the pit the screen goes [COLOR='Blue']BLUE[COLOR='White']even when i walk away from it the effect stays. I can't get past this area because of this please help!

item.title: Blue screen
item.dc:creator: JokeTag
item.description:
TurboTsunami:

Have you at least installed the latest drivers for your chipset and graphics card?

Last time i did was probably over the summer

Read full topic

item.title: Blue screen

item.description:
Have you at least installed the latest drivers for your chipset and graphics card?

Read full topic

item.title: Blue screen
item.dc:creator: JokeTag
item.description:
Cpl.1nsane:

Try disabling the noise shader and/or other visual options in the black mesa options tab.

Most likely due to old hardware.

Tbh it prolly is old hardware but that didnt help me.

Read full topic

item.title: Blue screen
